facts.text: I feed my babies with my own skin! Parent discus make a special nutritious slime that our babies eat.
I'm called the King of the Aquarium! People love my beautiful round shape and amazing colors.
Both Mom and Dad take care of us! My parents take turns letting babies feed from their skin slime.
I'm shaped like a disc so I can slip between plants and hide from predators in the Amazon.
I'm picky about my water! I need warm, soft, clean water to stay healthy and show my best colors.
